sentences.en: ...seven women dressed in their finest attire.
Great men are seldom over scrupulous in the arrangement of their attire.
sentences.cn: 伟人们很少对于服饰过于拘泥.

sentences.en: Her attention was attracted by his peculiar attire.
sentences.cn: 他那奇特的服装引起了她的注意.

sentences.en: Her attire was a light, neatly - fitting but amply flowing dress of muslin.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一件薄薄的, 齐整合身的,相当潇洒的麻纱衣服.

sentences.en: His attire was even more worthy of remark.
sentences.cn: 倒是他那身装束要别致得多.

sentences.en: In my youth their singular attire impressed on me.
sentences.cn: 我年轻的时候,他们单调的服装给我留下过很深的印象.

sentences.en: In those crowded streets her attire did not rate a second glance.
sentences.cn: 在那些拥挤的街道她的穿着并未引起注意。

sentences.en: People wear slacks, sweaters, flat shoes, and all manner of casual attire for travel.
sentences.cn: 人们穿着宽松的长裤、运动衫、平底鞋和各式适合旅行的休闲服装。

sentences.en: She doffs her garb worn under fire and wears again female attire.
sentences.cn: 脱我战时袍着我旧时裳.

sentences.en: She is beautifully dressed, but still in male attire.
sentences.cn: 她穿着华丽, 但仍为男装.

sentences.en: The structure of her attire was always elaborate and yet never over - laboured.
sentences.cn: 她的衣服的款式一向很精致,可又从来不过分着意.

sentences.en: Their boots were the worst part of their attire.
sentences.cn: 鞋子是这些人穿着中最薄弱的环节.

sentences.en: There was an uncribbed, uncabined aspect in his eyes and attire.
sentences.cn: 他的眼神,他的服装, 都带着一种无拘无束、不良不莠的神气.

sentences.en: They imposed through their magnifcent attire.
sentences.cn: 他们靠华丽的服装来行骗.
